meanings.definition: A person who installs shingles on roofs.
meanings.sent1: The shinglers worked hard under the sun to fix the roof.
meanings.sent2: The skilled shinglers completed the roof installation efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The shinglers joked about having a 'high up' job.
meanings.sent4: The shinglers were like bees, buzzing around the roof with precision.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the shinglers' dedication to their craft.

meanings.definition: A tool used for cutting shingles.
meanings.sent1: The old shinglers were carefully sharpened for the job.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter reached for the shinglers to start the project.
meanings.sent3: The shinglers were so sharp, they could slice through anything!
meanings.sent4: The shiny shinglers gleamed in the sunlight as they cut through the wood.
meanings.sent5: The reliable shinglers never failed to make precise cuts.

meanings.definition: A company that specializes in installing shingles.
meanings.sent1: The local shinglers were known for their quality workmanship.
meanings.sent2: I hired the shinglers to replace the roof on my house.
meanings.sent3: The shinglers' logo featured a smiling roof with sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: The shinglers' reputation soared as they completed project after project.
meanings.sent5: The shinglers' vans were always spotted around town, ready to work.
